title: Evangelion: Death and Rebirth
description: Evangelion: Death and Rebirth is a 1997 Japanese animated science fiction film. It consists of two parts: Death and Rebirth, which were released simultaneously as a single feature-length film.

title: The End of Evangelion
description: The End of Evangelion is a 1997 Japanese animated science fiction film. It serves as an alternate ending to the Neon Genesis Evangelion television series.

title: Evangelion: 1.0 You Are (Not) Alone
description: Evangelion: 1.0 You Are (Not) Alone is a 2007 Japanese animated science fiction film. It is the first installment in a four-part film series and is a retelling of the original TV series.

title: Evangelion: 2.0 You Can (Not) Advance
description: Evangelion: 2.0 You Can (Not) Advance is a 2009 Japanese animated science fiction film. It is the second installment in a four-part film series and introduces new characters and plot elements.

title: Evangelion: 3.0 You Can (Not) Redo
description: Evangelion: 3.0 You Can (Not) Redo is a 2012 Japanese animated science fiction film. It is the third installment in a four-part film series and features significant departures from previous installments.

title: Evangelion: 3.0+1.0 Thrice Upon a Time
description: Evangelion: 3.0+1.0 Thrice Upon a Time is a 2021 Japanese animated science fiction film. It is the fourth and final installment in the Rebuild of Evangelion film series, serving as the conclusion to the story.
